mal:fundamental.name: Attribute
mal:fundamental.comment: Attribute is the base type of all Attributes of the MAL data model. Attributes are contained within Composites and are used to build complex structures that make the data model.

mal:fundamental.name: Composite
mal:fundamental.comment: Composite is the base structure for Composite structures that contain a set of Elements.

mal:fundamental.name: Object
mal:fundamental.comment: Object is the base structure for MO Objects in the MAL data model. Objects are representations of complex data types with two specific characteristics: Objects have a unique and an immutable identity and can be referenced unambiguously.

mal:fundamental.name: Element
mal:fundamental.comment: Element is the base type of all data constructs. All types that make up the MAL data model are derived from it.

mal:attribute.name: Blob
mal:attribute.comment: The Blob structure shall be used to hold binary data. It shall be a variable-length Octet array and the maximum length shall depend on the selected encoding.

mal:attribute.name: Boolean
mal:attribute.comment: The Boolean structure shall be used to hold Boolean Attributes. Possible values are ‘True’ or ‘False’.

mal:attribute.name: Duration
mal:attribute.comment: The Duration structure shall be used to hold duration Attributes at nanoseconds resolution. It can be negative because it may be used to represent offsets. The duration shall support a range between -2^63 nanoseconds, and (2^63)-1 nanoseconds (to allow representation as a 64-bit signed integer).

mal:attribute.name: Float
mal:attribute.comment: The Float structure shall be used to hold floating point Attributes using the IEEE 754 32-bit range.

mal:attribute.name: Double
mal:attribute.comment: The Double structure shall be used to hold floating point Attributes using the IEEE 754 64-bit range.

mal:attribute.name: Identifier
mal:attribute.comment: The Identifier structure shall be used to hold an identifier and can be used for indexing. It is a variable-length Unicode string and the maximum length shall depend on the selected encoding. For some encoding/decoding bindings, the use of a numeric value might be appropriate for this Attribute, for example, via a dictionary.

mal:attribute.name: Octet
mal:attribute.comment: The Octet structure shall be used to hold 8-bit signed Attributes. The permitted range is −128 to 127.

mal:attribute.name: UOctet
mal:attribute.comment: The UOctet structure shall be used to hold 8-bit unsigned Attributes. The permitted range is 0 to 255.

mal:attribute.name: Short
mal:attribute.comment: The Short structure shall be used to hold 16-bit signed Attributes. The permitted range is −32768 to 32767.

mal:attribute.name: UShort
mal:attribute.comment: The UShort structure shall be used to hold 16-bit unsigned Attributes. The permitted range is 0 to 65535.

mal:attribute.name: Integer
mal:attribute.comment: The Integer structure shall be used to hold 32-bit signed Attributes. The permitted range is −2147483648 to 2147483647.

mal:attribute.name: UInteger
mal:attribute.comment: The UInteger structure shall be used to hold 32-bit unsigned Attributes. The permitted range is 0 to 4294967295.

mal:attribute.name: Long
mal:attribute.comment: The Long structure shall be used to hold 64-bit signed Attributes. The permitted range is −9223372036854775808 to 9223372036854775807.

mal:attribute.name: ULong
mal:attribute.comment: The ULong structure shall be used to hold 64-bit unsigned Attributes. The permitted range is 0 to 18446744073709551615.

mal:attribute.name: String
mal:attribute.comment: The String structure shall be used to hold string Attributes. It is a variable-length Unicode string and the maximum length shall depend on the selected encoding.

mal:attribute.name: Time
mal:attribute.comment: The Time structure shall be used to hold absolute time Attributes. It shall represent an absolute date and time to millisecond resolution. The range shall depend on the selected encoding.

mal:attribute.name: FineTime
mal:attribute.comment: The FineTime structure shall be used to hold high-resolution absolute time Attributes. It shall represent an absolute date and time to nanosecond resolution. The range shall depend on the selected encoding.

mal:attribute.name: URI
mal:attribute.comment: The URI structure shall be used to hold URI addresses. It shall be a variable-length Unicode string and the maximum length shall depend on the selected encoding.

mal:attribute.name: ObjectRef
mal:attribute.comment: The ObjectRef structure shall be used to hold references to MO Objects.

mal:enumeration.name: InteractionType
mal:enumeration.comment: InteractionType is an enumeration that shall be used to hold the possible Interaction Pattern types.

mal:enumeration.name: SessionType
mal:enumeration.comment: SessionType is an enumeration that shall be used to hold the session types. This facilitates the use of different Sessions in out-of-band agreements.

mal:enumeration.name: QoSLevel
mal:enumeration.comment: QoSLevel is an enumeration that shall be used to hold the possible QoS levels. This facilitates the use of different QoS in out-of-band agreements.

mal:item.comment: Used for Best Effort QoS Level.

mal:enumeration.name: AttributeType
mal:enumeration.comment: AttributeType is an enumeration that shall be used to hold the defined MAL Attribute types.

mal:enumeration.name: MOArea
mal:enumeration.comment: MOArea is an enumeration that shall be used to hold the known existing area numbers in use.

mal:item.comment: The COM area number. The COM is deprecated; therefore this area number is reserved for backward compatibility.
The Monitor and Control area number.
The Mission Planning and Scheduling area number.
The Mission Data Product Distribution area number.

mal:composite.name: Subscription
mal:composite.comment: The Subscription structure shall be used when subscribing for updates using the PUBSUB Interaction Pattern. It shall contain a single identifier that identifies the subscription being defined and a set of entities being requested.

mal:field.name: subscriptionId
mal:field.comment: The identifier of this subscription.

mal:field.name: domain
mal:field.comment: Optional domain identifier. If NULL, the subscription shall match with any domain.

mal:field.name: selectedKeys
mal:field.comment: The list of names of the selected Subscription Keys to be transmitted to the consumer. The Subscription Keys that are not in this list will be removed. If NULL, then all Subscription Keys will be transmitted.

mal:field.name: filters
mal:field.comment: The list of filters for this subscription. The list of filters must be ANDed together. If NULL, the subscription will not filter specific keys.

mal:composite.name: SubscriptionFilter
mal:composite.comment: The SubscriptionFilter structure shall be used when subscribing for updates using the PUBSUB Interaction Pattern. It shall contain a single identifier that identifies the Subscription Key name and the set of values to be registered for the defined key name.

mal:field.name: name
mal:field.comment: The identifier name of the key.

mal:field.name: values
mal:field.comment: The list of values that are being subscribed for this key. These shall be ORed together.

mal:composite.name: UpdateHeader
mal:composite.comment: The UpdateHeader structure shall be used by updates using the PUBSUB Interaction Pattern. It shall hold information that identifies a single update.

mal:field.name: source
mal:field.comment: The source of the update, usually a PUBSUB provider.

mal:field.name: domain
mal:field.comment: The domain of this update. The individual domain identifier parts shall not be set as the wildcard character ‘*’.

mal:field.name: keyValues
mal:field.comment: The values for the PUBSUB keys. The values shall be ordered according to the defined keys if the consumer subscription did not enable trimming.

mal:composite.name: IdBooleanPair
mal:composite.comment: IdBooleanPair shall be a simple pair type of an identifier and Boolean value.

mal:field.name: id
mal:field.comment: The Identifier value.

mal:field.name: value
mal:field.comment: The Boolean value.

mal:composite.name: Pair
mal:composite.comment: Pair shall be a simple Composite structure for holding pairs.

mal:field.name: first
mal:field.comment: The attribute value for the first Element of this pair.

mal:field.name: second
mal:field.comment: The attribute value for the second Element of this pair.

mal:composite.name: NamedValue
mal:composite.comment: The NamedValue structure shall represent a simple pair type of an identifier and abstract Attribute value.

mal:field.name: name
mal:field.comment: The Identifier value.

mal:field.name: value
mal:field.comment: The Attribute value.

mal:composite.name: File
mal:composite.comment: The File structure represents a file and shall be used to hold details about a file. It may also, optionally, hold a BLOB of the file data. The file type shall be denoted using the internet MIME media types.

mal:field.name: name
mal:field.comment: The file name.

mal:field.name: mimeType
mal:field.comment: The MIME type of the file, NULL if not known.

mal:field.name: creationDate
mal:field.comment: The creation timestamp of the file, NULL if not known.

mal:field.name: modificationDate
mal:field.comment: The last modification timestamp of the file, NULL if not known.

mal:field.name: size
mal:field.comment: The size of the file in Octets, NULL if not known.

mal:field.name: content
mal:field.comment: The contents of the file, NULL if not supplied.

mal:field.name: metaData
mal:field.comment: A list of extra metadata for the file.

mal:composite.name: ObjectIdentity
mal:composite.comment: The ObjectIdentity structure shall represent the Object Identity of an MO Object.

mal:field.name: domain
mal:field.comment: The domain of the MO Object being referenced.

mal:field.name: key
mal:field.comment: The key of the MO Object being referenced.

mal:field.name: version
mal:field.comment: The version of the MO Object being referenced.

mal:composite.name: ServiceId
mal:composite.comment: The ServiceId structure shall represent a specific service in MO.

mal:field.name: keyArea
mal:field.comment: The area of this service taken from the numeric Area identifier of the service specification.

mal:field.name: keyService
mal:field.comment: The service taken from the numeric Service identifier of the service specification.

mal:field.name: keyAreaVersion
mal:field.comment: The Area Version of the service.

mal:composite.name: NullableAttribute
mal:composite.comment: NullableAttribute structure shall represent an Attribute that can be nullable.

mal:field.name: value
mal:field.comment: The value of the nullable attribute.

mal:error.name: Delivery Failed
mal:error.comment: Confirmed communication error.

mal:error.name: Delivery Timedout
mal:error.comment: Unconfirmed communication error.

mal:error.name: Delivery Delayed
mal:error.comment: Message queued somewhere awaiting contact.

mal:error.name: Destination Unknown
mal:error.comment: Destination cannot be contacted.

mal:error.name: Destination Transient
mal:error.comment: Destination middleware reports destination application does not exist.

mal:error.name: Destination Lost
mal:error.comment: Destination lost halfway through conversation.

mal:error.name: Authentication Failed
mal:error.comment: A failure to authenticate the message correctly.

mal:error.name: Authorisation Fail
mal:error.comment: A failure in the MAL to authorise the message.

mal:error.name: Encryption Fail
mal:error.comment: A failure in the MAL to encrypt/decrypt the message.

mal:error.name: Unsupported Area
mal:error.comment: The destination does not support the selected area.

mal:error.name: Unsupported Area Version
mal:error.comment: The destination does not support the selected area version.

mal:error.name: Unsupported Service
mal:error.comment: The destination does not support the selected service.

mal:error.name: Unsupported Operation
mal:error.comment: The destination does not support the selected operation.

mal:error.name: Bad Encoding
mal:error.comment: The destination was unable to decode the message.

mal:error.name: Internal
mal:error.comment: An internal error has occurred.

mal:error.name: Unknown
mal:error.comment: Operation specific.

mal:error.name: Incorrect State
mal:error.comment: The destination was not in the correct state for the received message.

mal:error.name: Too Many
mal:error.comment: Maximum number of subscriptions or providers of a broker has been exceeded.

mal:error.name: Shutdown
mal:error.comment: The component is being shutdown.

mal:error.name: Transaction Timeout
mal:error.comment: The interaction exceeded a certain timeout duration.
